short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A suite of features and enchancements for Reddit. Custom themes, account switcher, keyword filter, and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhances Reddit's UI with:
• Advanced filters for hiding posts
• Better expand/collapse controls for comments
• Account switcher
• Clear recently viewed subreddits button
• Custom theme colors
• Post authors in Home/Popular/All feeds
• Video playback speed controls
• Mute users to hide their comments and posts
• A variety of other enhancements!

(Redux is only supported for the latest version of Reddit)

Feedback is welcome at reddit.comments.redux@gmail.com
